thread.title: Sony Xperia X (2017) leaked in new image
thread.title_full: Sony Xperia X (2017) leaked in new image

title: Sony Xperia X (2017) leaked in new image
text:
Sony Xperia X (2017) leaked in new image Sony Xperia X (2017) leaked in new image By January 2, 2017 “The leaked Xperia X appears to sport narrow bezels and a thin frame” 
Last month, some alleged renders of a new Sony Xperia XA smartphone hit the interwebs. Now it appears that in addition to the Xperia XA 2017, Sony also seems to be working on a new variant of the Xperia X smartphone. Ahead of an official announcement, an alleged live image of the Xperia X 2017 has surfaced online. 
The photo looks like the retail box of the Xperia X 2017 model. The device appears to have narrow bezels on the sides, top and bottom. 
There’s no way to confirm the authenticity of this image, so it’s advisable to take this with a pinch of salt. The brand could unveil the new phone at CES later this week.
